title: Pre-emptive steps, better planning help meet peak power demand in April
description: India copes with high power demand during heat wave, hitting 224 GW last month. Major load from air conditioners. Heatwave continues till May 6. Majority electricity from coal-based power, with growth in solar and wind power.
